welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sabana Grande, Puerto Rico! Get ready to experience the enchanting charm of our city, known for its breathtaking landscapes and rich culture. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that Sabana Grande has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eugenio M De Hostos Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mercedita Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mercedita Airport handles all shipments and logistics for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Borinquen Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Borinquen Airport serves flights to and from other Caribbean islands.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password is required.
